name: PHAssetResourceCreationOptions
desc: A set of options affecting the creation of a new Photos asset from underlying resources.

items.name: var originalFilename: String?
items.desc: The filename for the asset resource being created.

items.name: var uniformTypeIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The uniform type identifier for the resource.

items.name: var shouldMoveFile: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether Photos moves or duplicates files when creating an asset resource.
